name: SLICE
description:
SLICE is a 2D game where you slice objects to solve puzzles. Slice through various unique levels full of mind-clicking experience. Use fun to explore gameplay mechanics to combine thinking with slicing.



Key Features

  • Minimalistic visual design
  • Challenging and rewarding puzzles
  • Light and Dark versions of levels
  • Fun to discover gameplay mechanics
  • Original, atmospheric music
  • Meditative atmosphere
